description: This file defines the LastPlayedIndexStore class which manages storing and retrieving the last played video index for different categories or rows in a TV video streaming Android app. It uses SharedPreferences to persist data locally.

classes.name: LastPlayedIndexStore
classes.description: A class that manages storing and retrieving the last played video index per row key using SharedPreferences.

methods.name: readAll
methods.description: Reads all stored indices as a JSONObject from SharedPreferences.

methods.name: writeAll
methods.description: Writes all indices stored in a JSONObject back to SharedPreferences.

methods.name: setLastIndex
methods.description: Stores the last played index for a specific row key.

methods.name: getLastIndex
methods.description: Retrieves the last played index for a specific row key, or null if not set.

methods.name: from
methods.description: Factory method to create an instance of LastPlayedIndexStore backed by SharedPreferences for a given Context.
